statements: SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_generation;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast_generation WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast_generation ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(forecast_value) AS avg_forecast_value FROM demand_forecast_generation GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_generation WHERE forecast_value > 1000;
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast_generation WHERE forecast_id = 1 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_generation WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY forecast_value DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_forecasts FROM demand_forecast_generation
SELECT product_id, AVG(forecast_value) AS average_forecast FROM demand_forecast_generation GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(forecast_value) > 500
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM demand_forecast_generation ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, product_id, log_timestamp FROM demand_forecast_logs WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_details FROM demand_forecast_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, forecast_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity > 100 ORDER BY forecast_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC
SELECT product_id, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT AVG(forecast_quantity) as avg_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'

SELECT df.product_id, df.forecast_date, dfl.log_timestamp FROM demand_forecast df JOIN demand_forecast_logs dfl ON df.product_id = dfl.product_id WHERE df.forecast_quantity < 50 ORDER BY dfl.log_timestamp ASC
SELECT MAX(forecast_quantity) as max_quantity, MIN(forecast_quantity) as min_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast;
SELECT forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value FROM forecast_history WHERE forecast_value > 100;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast WHERE demand_quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT log_date, log_message FROM demand_forecast_log WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY product_id DESC, forecast_date ASC
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecast GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_demand > 1000
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM forecast_history WHERE forecast_value >= 50 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM demand_forecast
SELECT log_date, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM demand_forecast_log GROUP BY log_date HAVING total_logs > 1 ORDER BY total_logs DESC, log_date ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT rep_name, region FROM sales_representatives ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 5000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT rep_name, region, quota FROM sales_representatives WHERE region = 'West' ORDER BY quota DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT rep_name, region, quota FROM sales_representatives WHERE quota > 5000 AND region = 'East' ORDER BY rep_name ASC
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_value > 1000;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < 5000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE product_id = 50;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value FROM forecasts WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
